items.composition: Body: 90% Nylon, 10% Spandex/ String: 75% Polyester, 13% Spandex, 12% Cupro/ Filter: Polypropylene
items.longDescription:
- The inner and outer materials have been changed for improved breathability.
- Can be fine-tuned for a more comfortable fit.
- Size indicator makes it easy to find yours.

High-performance 3-tier structure.
First layer of AIRism Mesh is smooth and highly breathable.
Second layer cuts up to 99% of particles such as bacteria and pollen.
Third layer uses the same AIRism Mesh as the first layer for improved breathability.
items.name: AIRism Face Mask (Pack of 3)
items.shortDescription: High-performance filter keeps you dry from splashes. Washable AIRism mask. Evolved design to be easier to breath in.

- Special triple-needle stitching on seams reduces skin contact.
- Interlining helps the collar keep its shape.
- Pockets lined with different fabric on each side to reduce thickness.
- Pockets lined with micro fleece on the palm side to keep hands warm.
- Piping tape on the cuffs keeps cold air out and makes the sleeves easier to roll up.
- Tape slide zipper is easy to use when wearing gloves.
